resources.string:
This app was developed to run in the background and serve as a reminder to maintain proper posture. 
 
 The regular notification option uses Android's native alarm scheduler to only send reminders after a specified interval. 
 
 The Smart Alert option uses the device's accelerometer to determine the angle relative to the floor. It preserves battery life by only polling the sensor momentarily every minute and only when the screen on. 

A device position between 0 and 35 degrees most often leads to a non-neutral neck position. In that instance, you will receive a Smart Alert.

 Visit www.or-oz.com/posture to learn more. Thank you for downloading!

Welcome to Posture Reminder! Press the settings button on the bottom right to get started. Remember, this app is optimized to run in the background. You can send a test notification by pressing the menu button at the top corner of the screen.
